response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize the way you manage your tasks and projects. This innovative solution has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of efficiency and user experience. We believe its value far exceeds $15,000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $18,000. This is an opportunity to secure a cutting-edge tool that could significantly enhance your productivity and streamline your operations. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of unparalleled support and a seamless integration process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
